feature.label: LPEX FreeMarker Template
feature.description: The LPEX FreeMarker Plug-in uses the Apache FreeMarker template engine for inserting RPG templates into your source code. You can use define input screens for assigning values to variables, which can be used in your templates. The plug-in comes with a C# Template Builder application to create and maintain your templates. The Apache FreeMarker Template Language (FTL) is a rich "programming" language that allows all sorts of program logic for developing your templates.
